Patisambhidā Sutta：1．Patisambhidā SuttaFive qualities which make a monk become that which he should：the four patisambhidā and knowledge of all things，great and small，which must be done for his fellow celibates．A．iii．113．

2．Patisambhidā SuttaSeven qualities which enable a monk to realize，unaided，the four patisambhidā．A．iv．32f．
